co2-calculation: (1) Oil yield from Karmakar rape seed = 1190 L / ha, sesame = 696 L / ha. 1190/696 = 1.71 * value of rape seed oil 1.56 = 2.67
references: 1. Marinussen et al., 2012 LCI data for the calculation tool Feedprint for greenhouse gas emissions of feed production and utilization. Cultivation oil seeds and oil fruits -> Table 52. Audsley et al., 2009, How long can we go? -> gives a value for sesame seeds 3.17 kg CO2e/kg3. Karmakar et al., 2010, Properties of various plants and animal feedstocks for biodiesel production. Table 1 oil yield L/ha for sesame 696 is between soybean and sunflower4. Ahmad et al., 2009, Energy Sources Part A: Recovery, Utilization and Environmental Effects. -> yields 35% oil by weight5. Nath et al., 2000, Effect of climatic variation on yield of sesame at different dates of sowing -> average 0.91t/ha yield
name: Sesamöl
